      Methods in ch.unibe.ese.shopnote.server.core that return Request 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Request[] RequestHandler.handle(Request request)
      This method handles one single request There is the possibility that it returns multiple requests
      Request[] RequestHandler.handle(Request[] requests)
      Slices up the request packet into single requests
      Request[] RequestHandler.returnRequests(Request request)
      Returns all requests for the author of the input paramter request (everything from his container)
      Methods in ch.unibe.ese.shopnote.server.core that return types with arguments of type Request 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Request> RequestContainer.getRequests()
      Get all requests from the container without deleting them
      java.util.ArrayList<Request> RequestContainer.popRequests()
      Get and delete all requests from the container

    • Uses of Request in ch.unibe.ese.shopnote.share.requests

      Subclasses of Request in ch.unibe.ese.shopnote.share.requests 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CreateSharedListRequest
      This is the only request that is generated by the server.
      class  EmptyRequest
      This request is like a ping, just to say hello
      class  FriendRequest
      Ask the server if your friend has the app
      class  RegisterRequest
      Some trivial implementation of the Request class It just forwards the Phonenumber, which is already implemented in the basic Request class
      class  ShareListRequest
      Asks the server to share the ShoppingList specified by ch.unibe.ese.core.ShoppingList.getId() with ONE friend.
      class  UnShareListRequest
      Do the reverse of the ShareListRequest:
      Ask the server to delete the entry where your friend is matched to your shopping list

    • Uses of Request in ch.unibe.ese.shopnote.share.requests.listchange

      Subclasses of Request in ch.unibe.ese.shopnote.share.requests.listchange 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ItemRequest
      Request for changes happening on Items
      including: add, delete, change, set bought
      class  ListChangeRequest
      This class represents every request that has not to be handled by the server but by the client that will receive it
      class  RenameListRequest
      This request asks the user to rename his Shared list
